description:
A golden pyramid has been discovered deep in the jungle, and Wario has set
out to rob it. But when he enters, he finds the Golden Diva's curse has
taken away his moves! To escape with his life and more importantly, the
treasure, Wario must find his abilities to defeat the passage bosses and
the Golden Diva.

2.1.1.description:
I've decided to migrate the world code to a new repository to make APworld releases easier to work with. The branch at https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago/tree/wario_land_4 will stay open but is currently not being updated while I work out how to handle the two together.

## Additions
- Added option groups
- Actually added the Trap Behavior option. Accumulate is the previous behavior; Apply Once forces you to only receive one of each trap type if multiple get sent to you while you're not in a level

## Changes
- Because of the option groups addition, this release requires Archipelago version **0.5.0** or newer

## Bug fixes
- Fixed the music and Wario voice shuffle options bleeding across players
- Fixed a generation failure with the doors option set to open
2.1.1.title: 2.1.1: The world's new home

2.1.2.description:
## Additions
- Item groups:
  - Entry Jewel/Emerald/Ruby/Topaz/Sapphire/Golden Jewel Pieces
  - CDs
  - Abilities
  - Traps
  - Junk
- Location groups for each level. The treasures obtained from bosses in treasure hunt modes are under "\<boss name\> Treasures"
## Changes
- The description of the Logic option now links you to the resources for the enabled tricks and videos of said tricks
## Bug fixes
- Fixed bosses giving popups for defeating them on Golden Diva goal, despite that they don't actually give items
- Fixed Normal Doodle Woods CD Box in advanced logic being able to expect grab, despite that that room doesn't have any enemies on Normal
2.1.2.title: 2.1.2: A bit of convenience fixing

2.1.3.description:
## Bug fixes
- Fixed boss kills not saving on Golden Diva goal
- Fixed memory corruption when receiving an item from an aliased player
- Fixed the boss treasure location names being in reverse order
2.1.3.title: 2.1.3: I let these bugs get pretty big, huh?

2.1.4-pre1.description:
This release mostly implements the requested changes from https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3266.

Most significant among them are:
- Generation now warns if it has to override your options, and fails sooner if your settings don't allow enough locations to place the abilities
- The documentation has been revised in a few places and brought up-to-date with the world
- The data package has been changed. The range of item IDs has been shifted, and the location IDs now have an entirely new system
- Added Start Inventory From Pool option

Additionally, if your goal is Golden Diva Treasure Hunt, the treasure chest icon is now changed to a jewel piece box.

This is being run as a pre-release to allow some time to test that the refactors in this update haven't broken anything. More complete patch notes will be written for the full release of this update.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/2.1.3...2.1.4-pre1

EDIT: The version number was meant to be 2.2.0. This will be corrected for future pre-releases, if any.
2.1.4-pre1.title: 2.1.4-pre1

3.0.0.description:
This release is mostly to implement the requested changes from https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3266.

Most significant among them are:
- Generation now warns if it has to override your options, and fails sooner if your settings don't allow enough locations to place the abilities
- The documentation has been revised in a few places and brought up-to-date with the world
- The data package has been changed. The range of item IDs has been shifted, and the location IDs now have an entirely new system. This is the reason the major version has been updated.
- Added Start Inventory From Pool option

Additionally, if your goal is Golden Diva Treasure Hunt, the treasure chest icon is now changed to a jewel piece box.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/2.1.3...3.0.0

3.0.1.description:
- Added Trap Weight option (named weight for future-proofing purposes) that currently represents the percentage chance that a junk fill item will be a trap
- Open Doors option now defaults to Closed Diva. This is by far the better way to play a multiworld and can be nice for solo seeds, so this is a better default
- Fixed access rules being reversed between the Pink Circle Box and Blue Circle Box in Doodle Woods
- Documentation changes for AP main courtesy of @Fairweather-Furry

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/3.0.0...3.0.1

3.1.0.description:
## Additions
- Diamond Shuffle option
  - Adds every freestanding diamond in your selected difficulty as a shuffled item
  - Enabling diamond shuffle makes your shuffled moves replace diamonds before full health items if necessary
- Diamonds are now available as junk-fill items, meaning you may find them in chests even outside of diamond shuffle
- Added prize and junk weight options
  - These are now used together with trap weight to determine the chances of these items being placed as junk fill
  - Prizes = Full health items and diamonds
  - Junk = Hearts and medals
  - Traps = Transformation and lightning
- Added Restrict Self-Locking Jewel Pieces option
  - Prevents jewel pieces from being placed on their own bosses in treasure hunt modes, or in the Golden Pyramid.
  - Bosses may still have each other's jewel pieces, and they may still be locked behind a different player's bosses
- Added AP item sprites for progression and useful items 
- When Send Locations to Server is set to On Escape, the game will now hint the locations you found if you die, time out, or give up.
- Added more tricks to advanced logic:
  - Arabian Night: Bottom of Onomi box room with Grab
  - Hotel Horror: Frog Switch with midair stomp jump on Hard difficulty
  - Golden Passage: Skip current puzzle room without Swim
- Added some item groups which contain a single item to act like aliases:
  - Ground Pound, Smash Attack, Progressive Smash Attack -> Progressive Ground Pound
  - Grab -> Progressive Grab

## Changes
- Added new sprites for ability items
- Rearranged level select HUD
  - Ability icons are in the bottom left corner of the screen
  - In treasure hunt modes, your treasure collection is displayed at the top center of the screen instead of displacing your medal count
- Changed default option for Send Locations to Server to On Escape
  - This is more newcomer-friendly, as it's the vanilla behavior, and logic always behaves as if this option is selected
- Renamed "Enemy Jump" and "Minigame Coin" to "Stomp Jump" and "Minigame Medal"
  - "Stomp Jump" and "medal" are the names used in the game's manual
  - "Ground Pound" was not renamed because "Smash Attack" is dumb
  - The old names are available as single-item groups to act as aliases for the new names
- Sped up the level results screen: The collection animation is skipped, and your remaining hearts are counted faster
- Wario now says "Sorry!" when collecting another player's trap
- Lightning traps now make a thunder sound before they damage Wario
- Slightly changed item name colors when Send Locations to Server is set to On Escape

## Bug fixes
- Fixed Fat Wario being zipped by crystals underwater without Swim
- Fixed "Sent to" messages on level results screen appearing even for items collected on a previous visit to the level
- Fixed "Received from" text sometimes not appearing on pyramid screen
- Fixed many cases of items appearing with the wrong palette when loading the room or pausing the game
- Fixed items being unplaced when setting Pool Jewels to 4
- Added player name and number to patch for custom webhosts

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/3.0.1...3.1.0
**Basepatch Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/WL4-Archipelago-Patch/compare/5ad267a...ae6958d

3.1.0-pre1.description:
- Added Diamond Shuffle option
  - Adds every diamond in your selected difficulty as shuffled locations
  - Enabling diamond shuffle makes your shuffled moves replace diamonds before full health items if necessary
- Diamonds are also now available as junk-fill items
- Added prize and junk weight options
  - These are now used together with trap weight to determine the chances of these items being placed as junk fill
  - Prizes = Full health items and diamonds
  - Junk = Hearts and minigame coins
  - Traps = Transformation and lightning
- Added more tricks to advanced logic
  - Arabian Night: Bottom of Onomi box room with Grab
  - Hotel Horror: Frog Switch with midair enemy jump on Hard difficulty
  - Golden Passage: Skip current puzzle room without Swim
- Wario now says "Sorry!" when collecting another player's trap
- Fixed items not being placed with Pool Jewels set to 4
- Fixed items sometimes appearing with wrong palette
- Fixed Fat Wario getting zipped by crystals underwater without Swim

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/3.0.1...3.1.0-pre1

3.1.0-pre2.description:
- Sped up level results screen: The collection animation is skipped and your remaining hearts are counted faster
- Renamed "Enemy Jump" and "Minigame Coin" to "Stomp Jump" and "Minigame Medal"
  - "Stomp Jump" and "medal" are the names used in the game's manual
  - "Ground Pound" was not renamed because "Smash Attack" is dumb
- Added item groups to act as aliases:
  - Ground Pound, Smash Attack, Progressive Smash Attack -> Progressive Ground Pound
  - Grab -> Progressive Grab
  - Enemy Jump -> Stomp Jump
  - Minigame Coin -> Minigame Medal
- Diamond fixes for Toy Block Tower:
  - Tower Diamond (Hard) fixed
  - Digging Room Diamond (all difficulties) was entirely absent from shuffle
- Wildflower Fields Escape Corner Diamond was erroneously marked as Normal only
- Fixed item graphics getting replaced with garbage when pausing the game
- Fixed "Received from" text sometimes not appearing on pyramid screen

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/3.1.0-pre1...3.1.0-pre2

3.1.0-pre3.description:
- Trap items in diamond locations will disguise themselves as important items
- Added a delay and thunder sound to the lightning trap
- Slightly changed item name colors when Send Locations to Server is set to On Escape
- Renamed 40 Below Fridge Crystal Lobbing Diamond to Glass Ball Puzzle for consistency
- Fixed reversed location names between Pink and Blue Circle boxes in Doodle Woods
- Updated logic rules for diamonds in:
  - The Toxic Landfill
  - 40 Below Fridge
  - Domino Row
  - Fiery Cavern
  - Golden Passage
- Added player name and number to patch for custom webhosts

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/3.1.0-pre2...3.1.0-pre3

3.1.0-pre3.title: 3.1.0 Prerelease 3

3.1.0-pre4.description:
- Added new sprites for ability items
- Added sprites for progression and useful AP items
- Changed default option for Send Multiworld Items to On Escape
  - If set to On Escape, you will get hints for everything you found if you die, time out, or give up. Resetting will not give you the hints.
- Rearranged level select HUD
  - Ability icons are in the bottom left corner of the screen
  - In treasure hunt modes, your treasure collection is displayed at the top center of the screen instead of displacing your medal count
- Wario no longer says anything when collecting a heart or AP filler item from a diamond location
- Adjusted colors for AP item name text
- Fixed Pinball Zone Robot Room Diamond access rule
- Receiving a diamond from the multiworld while underwater now plays the correct sound

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/3.1.0-pre3...3.1.0-pre4
**Basepatch Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/WL4-Archipelago-Patch/compare/9e97887...90ed8e7
3.1.0-pre4.title: 3.1.0 Prerelease 4

3.1.1.description:
- The tracker will now display the world map when you're at the level select in a passage
- The game state will always be resent if you disconnect from the server and reconnect
- Fixed assertion failure from invalid options
- Fixed other games' traps appearing incorrectly in chests
- Fixed minigame medals having the wrong colors when received in the pyramid

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/3.1.0...3.1.1
**Basepatch Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/WL4-Archipelago-Patch/compare/ae6958d...ab3336b

3.2.0.description:
This one should've been a simple bugfix but got scope-creeped. And I got occupied decompiling the vanilla game which delayed it further. Oops. (at least it ended up being useful for this)

- This AP world now requires AP version 0.6.0 or newer
- Renamed 40 Below Fridge snowman puzzle boxes so the names are correct on all difficulties (**this is a breaking change**)
- Improved the open portals visual so the vortex never closes
- Added tricks to advanced logic:
  - 40 Below Fridge with heavy grab: throw the Yeti at the block during the escape
  - Domino Row escape with only swim: Shoulder bash the blocks on the way up. You can take a hit and use the invulnerability frames to hit the second one through the spikes. This replaces the strategies of using grab or head smash.
- Fixed golden treasure requirement being completely ignored by logic
- Fixed client inappropriately sending locations for the wrong level (and made some adjustments so it's *slightly* more responsive to your game state)
- Fixed boss door cutscenes sometimes playing (and the occasional freeze that resulted)
- Fixed certain options overfilling the item pool
- Fixed Monsoon Jungle fat plummet room access rules
- Fixed Toy Block Tower digging room diamond access rule

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/3.1.1...3.2.0
**Basepatch Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/WL4-Archipelago-Patch/compare/ab3336b...e73b5b2

3.2.1.description:
- Fixed an issue where locations you haven't collected would send to the server when entering a level on immedate-send mode.
- Added an advanced logic trick to get the DR toy car tower diamond

3.3.0.description:
## Options changes
- Send Multiworld Items now only affects other players' items: your own items will be delayed until the game autosaves (when you exit via the vortex)
- Added Keyzer Shuffle, which randomizes Keyzer's location in the level. This can be combined with open doors to effectively add an extra location to each level, or with closed doors and open portals to make the access requirements for the next level a little spicier.
- Fixed an issue where the music transitions for pink rooms wouldn't work correctly with shuffled music

## Patcher changes
- Modified the title screen to now display as "Wario Land 4 Randomizer"
- The game now displays a clear time and collection rate after the credits, during the "Steaks!" cutscene
- Japanese ROMs are now forced to use the English text
- Slightly adjusted the patch format

## Logic changes
- DR switch ladder diamond now requires dash attack
- AN Scienstein puzzle diamond no longer requires dash attack

## Other changes
- Added AP World manifest

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/3.2.1...3.3.0
**Base patch**: https://github.com/lilDavid/WL4-Archipelago-Patch/compare/3.2.0...3.3.0

3.3.1.description:
## Options changes
* Fixed Keyzer shuffle allowing Keyzer to be placed in its usual level but in someone else's world
## Logic changes
* Added advanced trick to access the pink room near the switch in Domino Row without dash attack

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/3.3.0...3.3.1

3.3.2.description:
* Fixed an issue where turning Open Doors on and Keyzer Shuffle off would make Keyzers completely cease to exist
* Fixed the '0' character being broken on sent off-world items
* (Finally) added Keyzers item group

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lilDavid/Archipelago-Wario-Land-4/compare/3.3.1...3.3.2
**Basepatch**: https://github.com/lilDavid/WL4-Archipelago-Patch/compare/3cee1d2...676516d
